lead_paragraph: The latest New York Times/CBS News Poll is based on telephone interviews conducted March 15 through March 18 with 1,067 adults throughout the United States. Of these, 492 adults identified themselves as fans of major league baseball, saying that they were very or somewhat interested in following the sport.
